reviewText: Not pleased!  Dvd refuse to run ,even though I have a multi-region dvd player.
Love anything with John Inman in it. Favuorite series with him is are you being served
I love John Inman! This isn't his best vehicle, but still, I love John Inman.

If you like John Inman then you should see this. I bought a special PAL dvd player to see this one disc. Its funny and I watch it over and over. Also John Inman was in a show called "Take A Letter Mr Jones" Its also a PAL disc/THANK THE SELLERS OF THIS DISC THEY ARE ULTRA SPECIAL AWESOME PEOPLE!THANKS:)
What a great find! My family loved this cute show. Wish there were more episodes made though. John Inman is delightful in this!
Love the quick service and John Inman's show, wish there had been more episodes.

This series has many funny parts. I would compare it to another British comedy titled Are You Being Served wherein John Inman also stars. As to my purchase I was highly impressed when asked to make sure this DVD was compatible with my player as I live in the United States and the DVD is compatible with UK or foreign devices. That was very helpful.
